document.full_text: australia's state-owned national broadband network awarded a contract to sweden's ericsson worth up to a$1.1 billion ($1.2 billion), the latest in a string of contracts to build the a$35.9 billion network.
document.title: ericsson wins contract worth up to $1.2 billion in australia
lines_and_colors: australia's state-owned national broadband network awarded a contract to sweden's ericsson worth up to a$1.1 billion ($1.2 billion), the latest in a string of contracts to build the a$35.9 billion network.
